title: State of emergency across north-east as blizzard prepares to wallop coast - as it happened | US news | The Guardian
summary: resource : travel bans and delays , state by state .
what to do if you lose power .
long island travel ban to begin at 11pm .

text: we 've launched a new live blog to carry our continuing coverage of the storm .
you can follow the new blog here .
meanwhile here 's a summary of where things stand : snow began to accumulate up and down the east coast as residents braced for what forecasters said could be a blizzard of historic proportions .
governors across the northeast declared states of emergencies .
airports and schools were to be closed tuesday .
travel bans were to take effect monday night .
the heaviest band of snowfall was expected for eastern long island , connecticut , and eastern massachusetts including the boston area .
wind gusts on long island were projected to reach as high as 70mph .
forecasts for snow from new york city to boston and farther north held steady at 18-36 inches .
a national weather service blizzard warning is in place through early wednesday .
read a state-by-state guide to travel bans and transportation delays .
most public transportation in the region was to be shut down by late monday .
each state moved emergency response resources - plows , tow trucks , sand , salt and even national guard troops - into position for quick deployment overnight .
officials warned residents not to go out in the storm and to check on neighbors .
a state-by-state guide to emergency resources is here .
a guide to what to do if you lose power is here .
cuomo clarifies the subway closure .
the entire system '' will close at 11pm , he says .
a new york-area airport update : virtually all flights '' at la guardia will be cancelled .
there will be extensive '' cancellations at jfk , too .
this is a serious situation , '' cuomo says .
violations could be a misdemeanor and fines of up to $ 300 .
he said the subways need to close by 11pm so that trains can be stored .
as for the roads , the roads are already very very dangerous , '' he says .
it 's dangerous to be out there now .
it 's only going to become more dangerous .
at one point it 's going to become irresponsible . ''

documents.title: cuomo : 11pm a 'hard stop time '
text: cuomo says nothing really changed in the 4pm weather forecast , '' except the winds in long island look to be worse - up to 70mph .
the worst of it [ looks ] on long island , '' cuomo says .
the mta and port authority will close their facilities at 11 o'clock .
cuomo calls that a hard stop time . ''
we are also restricting travel on all roads in the 13 counties '' in the south , cuomo says , as of 11pm et .
here they are : governor andrew cuomo , mta chairman tom prendergast , port authority director pat foye , and other state officials .

documents.title: resource : travel bans and delays , state by state
text: we 've published a guide to travel bans and delays currently in place , state-by-state .
we 'll update it continuously for the duration of the storm .
cold-weather driving trips on twitter , brought to you by the virginia department of transportation .
if this tweet has a lot of information in it you have not seen before , the best advice may be to leave it in park until the emergency crews have done their work .
vdot richmond ( @ vadotrva ) need to brush up on winter driving tips ?
we 've got them here : # vatraffic # rvatraffic
snowed in never looked so good .
stay warm bette !
bette midler ( @ bettemidler ) looks like we 're gon na be snowed in !
and the real blizzard has n't even started yet !
( h/t : @ twitterid )
you can watch new york governor cuomo 's next news briefing , scheduled to begin at 4.30pm , update : moved to 4.45pm , here .

the power companies are preparing to respond to outage calls : cl & p ( @ ctlightandpower ) our own employees and outside crews are geared up , and ready to provide superior service to our customers .
pse & g ( @ psegdelivers ) pse & g has extra crews and equipment on hand to respond to any outages as result of heavy snow+strong winds :
how might tonight 's blizzard measure up against the truly big ones ?

the guardian 's alan yuhas looks back at five of the biggest storms ever to bite the big apple : the blizzard of 26-27 december 1947 : central park records 25.8in the storm that struck the east coast in 1947 was an altogether different beast than the record-holder .

on staten island people had to climb out their windows to get to work ; snowdrifts piled snow several feet high in brooklyn ; and manhattan streets were buried as snow clogged sewer drains and entombed cars and buseswherever they stopped .
cities struggled to respond to the storm , which surprised meteorologists by advancing from the atlantic , paralyzing response teams and making food and energy commodities of survival .
seventy-seven people died due to the storm .
rhode island has issued a coastal flood advisory for newport and washington counties , to be in effect midnight til 2am tuesday .
here 's the scene at the bridge they 're building next to the tappan zee , 30 miles up the hudson river from new york city .

somewhere in that whiteout is the world 's largest floating crane : the new ny bridge ( @ newnybridge ) this tells the story , and only will worsen , all construction stopped , emergency crews on standby
here 's a new york state police snow machine : state of new york ( @ nygov ) .
@ nyspolice troopers are preparing to assist motorists during the storm .
# blizzardof2015
capital weather gang ( @ capitalweather ) the snow might be treacherous , but it sure is pretty .
central park about 10 minutes ago .
# nyc

'blizzard ' defined here 's something to keep in mind as you come across maps with various wind speeds written on them : the official definition of blizzard , '' according to the national weather service weather glossary : blizzard ( abbrev .

blzd ) - a blizzard means that the following conditions are expected to prevail for a period of 3 hours or longer : sustained wind or frequent gusts to 35 miles an hour or greater ; and considerable falling and/or blowing snow ( i.e. , reducing visibility frequently to less than ¼ mile ) some forecasts have wind speeds around cape cod expected to top 50mph in this storm .
a winter storm is defined as heavy snow or significant ice accumulations '' without sustained high winds .

documents.title: what to do if you lose power
text: here are the new york state recommendations for action to take - and not - in case of power outages : first , call your utility company to determine area repair schedules .
turn off or unplug lights and appliances to prevent a circuit overload when service is restored .
leave one light on to indicate when power has been restored .
if heat goes out during a winter storm , keep warm by closing off rooms you do not need .
to help prevent freezing pipes , turn on faucets slightly .
running water will not freeze as quickly .
keep refrigerator and freezer doors closed as much as possible to help reduce food spoilage .
protect yourself from carbon monoxide poisoning : do not operate generators indoors ; the motor emits deadly carbon monoxide gas .
do not use charcoal to cook indoors .
it , too , can cause a buildup of carbon monoxide gas .
do not use your gas oven to heat your home .
prolonged use of an open oven in a closed house can create carbon monoxide gas .
make sure fuel space heaters are used with proper ventilation .
cuomo keeps pointing out that buffalo , ny got 7 feet of snow earlier this winter .
at the time southern and eastern counties sent equipment west to help out , he says .
now the equipment is flowing downstate .
that 's how we roll in new york , '' cuomo says .
one community for another .

documents.title: long island travel ban to begin at 11pm
text: new york governor andrew cuomo is speaking on long island .
he said the hope is to have the long island railroad shut down around 10.30-11pm .
he asks people to begin their commutes out of the city early .
we are expecting a very high rank of snowfall starting later this evening , combined with high gusts , '' he says .

you almost ca n't plow that much snow that quickly if nothing changes at the 4 o'clock weather update , at 11 o'clock tonight we will impose a travel ban on all roads on long island except for emergency personnel . ''
the brooklyn nets and new york knicks games scheduled for tonight both have been postponed due to the storm , accuweather reports .
( for our readers overseas , maybe : we speak of basketball . )
brooklyn nets ( @ brooklynnets ) game update > > tonight 's # nets vs. # blazers game postponed due to weather conditions .
details :
washington dc looks to get off relatively easy this time , according to nbc 's chief meteorologist : doug kammerer ( @ dougkammerer ) do not expect much more from this storm .
some areas may see an inch , but most areas wo n't see much at all .
watch for slick roads though # ice
serious indeed : weatherbug ( @ weatherbug ) nooooooooooooo !
not @ twitterid !
rt @ twitterid90 @ twitterid and the latest sign of the # snowmageddon2015 .
another wave of forecast updates is scheduled for 4pm et , with another round of news conferences to follow .
the new york briefing is scheduled for 4.30pm , and connecticut is scheduled for 5pm .
will boston get crushed '' , or just buried '' ?
it 's an open question : eric fisher ( @ ericfisher ) snow map speaks for itself .
we all get buried .
i wo n't be shocked if a town or two hits 40 '' before wed am .

the house of representatives has cancelled votes scheduled for monday evening because of the snowstorm , the hill reports : originally , the house was to consider six bills to combat human trafficking , but with the national weather service issuing blizzard warnings from coastal new jersey to maine , lawmakers were having trouble making it back to washington .
read the full piece here .
( thanks @ twitterid )

here 's an animated view , via nasa 's goddard space flight center : nasa goddard images ( @ nasagoddardpix ) satellite video from space shows massive developing nor'easter in u.s. : # blizzardof2015 ( h/t : @ twitterid )

documents.title: pennsylvania proclaims disaster emergency
text: the philadelphia inquirer reports that governor tom wolf has followed the lead of his colleagues to the east : philly inquirer ( @ phillyinquirer ) gov wolf signed a disaster emergency proclamation to enable state and local authorities to respond to any unmet needs during the snowstorm .
empty shelves at fairway food market in manhattan ahead of the approaching blizzard on january 26 , 2015 in new york city .
connellan / barcroft usa heavy surf pounds the shoreline where a boardwalk once stood before it was damaged by hurricane sandy , on january 26 , 2015 in atlantic city , nj .
wilson/getty images travelers stand in line in terminal c at logan international airport .
mccollester/getty images
connecticut governor dan malloy took a question earlier about whether the pro wrestling event scheduled for the xl center in hartford would go on .
monday night raw has been cancelled : wfsb channel 3 ( @ wfsbnews ) the @ twitterid has canceled monday night raw at the @ twitterid .

some early , manageable snowfall totals for the new york area : nws new york ny ( @ nwsnewyorkny ) some totals so far as of 1 pm : nyc : 0.5 '' , lga : 0.3 '' , jfk : 0.3 '' , ewr : 0.5 '' , bdr : 0.1 '' , and isp : 0.5 ''

another look at that euro model , showing a stripe of 3 feet '' deep red running right over a certain northeastern capital : capital weather gang ( @ capitalweather ) euro model is in , shows a little less snow for nyc , and a lot of snow for e. mass .
updates :

documents.title: philadelphia declares snow emergency
text: philadelphia is not in the current blizzard warning zone , but mayor michael nutter has declared a snow emergency starting at 6 p.m. , philly.com reports .
the city has banned parking from designated snow routes .
under a new law , residents could face fines for leaving cats and dogs outside in winter storms .
a dog in central park monday .
allegri/reuters
massachusetts has announced that all modes of massachusetts bay transportation authority service will be suspended all day and night on tuesday , january 27 , 2015 .
the mbta posts these updates : subway the red , blue , orange , silver , green , and mattapan line service will be suspended on tuesday , january 27 , 2015 .
for up-to-the-minute service information , please check t-alerts .
commuter rail all commuter rail lines will be suspended on tuesday , january 27 , 2015 .
for up-to-the-minute service information , including all delays , please check t-alerts .
bus all bus routes will be suspended on tuesday , january 27 , 2015 .
for updates , please check t-alerts .
for real-time gps tracking , download an app from our app showcase .
boat commuter boat service will be suspended on tuesday , january 27 , 2015 .
for up-to-the-minute service information , please check t-alerts .

new jersey transit will close by 10pm but trains will continue to run to keep tracks and wires clear : nj transit ( @ njtransit ) trains will run up & down the tracks after suspension of service to ensure tracks & overhead wires remain clear of snow/ice # njtwinter nj transit ( @ njtransit ) all njt service ( rail , bus , light rail ) scheduled to reach its final destination by 10pm will be the last to run tonight # njtwinter

that euro model run that shows boston getting buried has rather good news for new york city ( if you consider less snow good news ) , fivethirtyeight 's harry enten writes : harry enten ( @ forecasterenten ) euro is still over a foot in nyc but it 's well down from the 2+ it had in previous runs .
monday midday penn station is looking like friday afternoon penn station : anthony quintano ( @ anthonyquintano ) a packed penn station right now # blizzardof2015
based on the latest european weather model , fivethirtyeight 's harry enten sees boston getting absolutely crushed . ''
harry enten ( @ forecasterenten ) here 's the euro snow map boston gets absolutely crushed .
boston mayor marty walsh has announced school closures for wednesday as well as tuesday : eric fisher ( @ ericfisher ) mayor walsh cancels boston schools for both tuesday and wednesday .
good move !
makes planning easier .
video : 'it 's going to be an all-snow event ' with possible-record snowfalls anticipated , tv forecasters are not underplaying the event .
the blizzard has delayed jury selection in the federal death penalty trial of boston marathon bombing suspect dzhokhar tsarnaev , the judge said .
judge george o'toole jr. acknowledged monday that jury selection has been moving more slowly than anticipated but said , we 're making good progress . ''
o'toole originally said he hoped to question about 40 people per day .
but during the first six days , a total of 81 people were questioned .
o'toole said no jurors will be called in tuesday because an impending blizzard is expected to dump 2 to 3 feet of snow on the region .

documents.title: new york city schools to close
text: school will be closed tomorrow , tuesday , the mayor says .
all after-school programs monday are cancelled .
alternate-side parking rules are cancelled through wednesday .
garbage and recycling collection will very likely '' be suspended through wednesday , if not beyond , '' de blasio says .
de blasio says that if anyone experiences or witnesses price gouging , a call should be placed to 311 .
city parks will close at 6pm , to eliminate risk of falling tree limbs .

documents.title: new york city declares state of emergency
text: de blasio declares a state of emergency and a vehicle ban in new york city starting at 11pm .
you ca n't underestimate this storm .
this is not a ty storm .
it 's going to pack a real punch , '' he says .
what you 're going to see in a few hours is something that hits very hard and very fast , and people can not be caught off guard , '' he says .
he tells people who can leave work early should .
as part of our emergency declaration , at 11 o'clock tonight , our streets will only be open to emergency vehicles . ''

documents.title: de blasio : 2,300 vehicles with plows to deploy
text: de blasio is up .
he details the emergency response effort already under way : he says there are nearly 500 salt spreaders .
2,400 sanitation workers per shift .
untold tons of salt .
over 1,800 snow plows have been deployed .
in grand total , over 2,300 vehicles with plowing capacity , plus 250 other vehicles from other agencies .
1,800 potholes will be filled before the storm , he says .
40 % more ambulances this afternoon and evening .
fdny will add 500 staff on duty .
the sanitation department has 6,000 miles of streets to cover constantly , under intense pressure . ''
we can help by getting out of the way of sanitation vehicles , of emergency vehicles . ''
nyc mayor 's office ( @ nycmayorsoffice ) watch now : mayor @ twitterid gives an update on blizzard preparations live on # safenyc

documents.title: american airlines cancels all later regional flights
text: it was announced at governor cuomo 's news conference that an estimated 70 % of flights in and out of nyc-area airports were expected to be cancelled .
that is a bit grimmer even than the current de on flightaware 's misery map .
flight aware currently is counting 1,084 total delays within , into , or out of the united states today ; and 2,604 total cancellations within , into , or out of the united states today .

update from reuters : american airlines group has canceled all late afternoon and evening flights scheduled for monday from the new york area , philadelphia and boston as a major winter storm bears down on the northeast , spokeswoman andrea huguely said .
the cancellations affect flights of american airlines , us airways and all regional partners , huguely said in an email .
the company plans to resume operations as soon as it is safe to do so , '' she said .
as of early monday afternoon , the company had canceled 626 flights that were scheduled for monday and 970 scheduled for tuesday , she said .
here 's what 2-feet-plus of snow in nyc looks like : capital weather gang ( @ capitalweather ) flashback : manhattan after 26.9 '' in 2006 - snowiest storm on record .
( via @ twitterid )

documents.title: cuomo reiterates climate change warning
text: the new york governor reiterates a warning about climate change he memorably delivered after superstorm sandy in october 2012 .
there is a pattern of extreme weather that we 've never seen before , '' cuomo said today .
steven d'souza ( @ cbcsteve ) nyc gov .

cuomo : `` there is a pattern of extreme weather that we 've never seen before part of the changing climate `` # nycblizzard here 's what cuomo said back in 2012 : cuomo said the climate has changed and the city needs to prepare for high water .
anyone who says there 's not a dramatic change in weather patterns is probably denying reality . ''
we have to find ways to build this city back stronger and better than every before . ''

as our live blog coverage continues , here 's a summary of where things stand , as a major blizzard develops in the region : states throughout the northeast declared states of emergency effective immediately at midday monday .
joining the declaration were new jersey , new york , connecticut , rhode island and massachusetts .
multiple states announced travel bans .
connecticut will close roads at 9pm , massachusetts will follow suit at midnight , and new york is considering an 11pm closure .
the state of emergency declarations allow the governors immediately to mobilize emergency crews and resources .
the northeastern states announced details of the emergency response taking shape .
snow plows are activated , tons of salt are being moved , tow trucks are at the ready , and hundreds of national guard troops will be deployed in new york and long island .
shoppers across the region stocked up on groceries and made other preparations to spend the next two days inside .
boston announced the closure of all public schools for tuesday .
connecticut also announced school closures .
new jersey and new york were expected to follow suit .
i do n't expect we 'll have transit tomorrow , '' governor christie says .
public transit in new york city was scheduled to go offline monday evening .
the nyc subway will begin to run on a curtailed schedule after 7pm 8pm , governor cuomo said .
click here for more information .
massachusetts announces a travel ban to begin at midnight .
connecticut 's is at 9pm .
new york 's may begin at 11pm .
charlie baker ( @ massgovernor ) from @ twitterid , announcing a state of emergency effective now & a statewide travel ban starting at midnight in preparation for the blizzard .
cuomo says once the weather clears up '' , regular transit service should return in short order .
part of the closure rationale is to make sure you do n't damage the trains so they can get back in service as soon as possible , '' he says .
cuomo says connecticut could get the storm worse than new york , and that 's why new york 's potential travel ban would be later - at 11pm , if it happens , instead of 9pm .
they are gon na get hit worse than we are , theoretically , '' he says .
path trains will operate as usual until 9pm , when it will go on weekend schedule , cuomo announces .
there will be a tractor-trailer ban on the southern thruway and other major highways from 4pm on , he says .
we are considering at this time a travel ban on all main roads starting at 11pm tonight , '' he says , to be confirmed after the 4pm forecast update .
it 's never an easy decision '' , cuomo says .
some people find it an inconvenience .
if you leave the roads open , people get stuck on the roads . ''
this is not a storm to take lightly .
we 're taking what we believe are prudent measures .
the times i gave you today are based on information we have at this time 4 o'clock we 'll get the most recent update . ''

documents.title: nyc subway 'limited service ' after 8pm
text: update : cuomo had said 7-8pm , '' now his office says 8pm : andrew cuomo ( @ nygovcuomo ) .
@ mta subways will run normally until between 7 pm & 8 pm , after which service will be limited .
# blizzardof2015 cuomo says the subway will run as normal until 7pm but at 7-8 o'clock they want to start to put the trains away '' and there will be limited service . ''
we have to close down the subway system earlier , '' he says .
metro north and long island railroad will have early service , but the state anticipates closing the two lines at 11pm .
that 's to be confirmed after the 4pm weather advisory .

documents.title: new york declares state of emergency
text: cuomo 's conference opens : this is gon na be a blizzard .
it is a serious blizzard , and it could affect health and safety . ''
he says the storm will see gusts of up to 55 mph and that 's what makes the situation dangerous and difficult .
it 's the snow combined with the wind . ''
there will be dangerous and difficult conditions , '' he says .
the state has been preparing for three days .
there are 750 plows coming from across the state to the nyc metropolitan area , he says .
50,000 pounds of salt ; several hundred national guard in nyc and long island ; the state of emergency is for the southern counties .
it allows me to waive certain laws and regulations , to move faster , '' he says .

documents.title: boston public schools to be closed
text: boston has announced the closure of all public schools for tuesday , the globe reports .
back to christie : the overall message is this , everybody .
we 've been through this plenty of times before this is my sixth winter as governor but you never know how bad these conditions are going to be .
he tells people to only go out in the case of an absolute emergency or necessity '' beginning this afternoon .
he tells people to stay off the roads and let emergency crews work .

documents.title: rhode island declares state of emergency
text: rhode island has now declared a state of emergency .
breaking news ( @ breakingnews ) live video : rhode island gov .
gina raimondo holds a news conference on storm preparedness - @ twitterid update : the emergency will come with a midnight travel ban .
we 're still waiting for new york governor andrew cuomo 's press conference to begin .

documents.title: christie : 'i do n't expect we 'll have transit tomorrow '
text: if you do not have to drive , please remain home , '' christie says .
he says there 's a full statewide mobilization '' of emergency vehicles and manpower . ''
there are nearly 3,700 trucks at the ready already spreading salt .
tow trucks are ready to clear stalled vehicles .
safety patrols are at large .
nj transit vehicles have been equipped with plows .
christie calls for passengers on mass transit to practice care .
i do n't expect we 'll have transit tomorrow , '' christie says .
he says he expects to shut down transit tonight arount 10pm
christie says he has closed state offices for tuesday .
he said in the south , there could be as little snow as 6 inches .
but the northeast could see two feet and blizzard-force winds , he says .
the worst conditions will be overnight tonight , from 9pm until around noon tomorrow , '' he says .

documents.title: new jersey declares state of emergency
text: christie appears first .
this is gon na be a significant storm , '' he says .
he announces a state of emergency .
new jersey governor chris christie will also hold a noon news conference .
you can watch it here .
you can watch the imminent briefing by new york governor andrew cuomo here .
a winter storm approaching the eastern united states is seen in a noaa goes satellite image released january 26 , 2015 .
/reuters 7th avenue in manhattan ahead of the approaching blizzard on january 26 , 2015 in new york city .
connellan / barcroft usa

massachusetts governor charlie baker has announced a news conference to begin at the same time as new york governor cuomo 's scheduled news conference : charlie baker ( @ massgovernor ) at noon , we will be hosting a press conference at @ twitterid with important information on the blizzard .
stay tuned .
for those of you on twitter , a list of forecasters and news outlets is here , and a list including regional emergency officials is here .

new yorkers are demonstrating their legendary mettle by standing in long lines at fairway in hopes of exchanging cash for foodstuffs : harry smith ( @ harrysmith ) getting ready for # blizzardof2015 upper west side .
line at # fairway get the latest @ twitterid adrian chen ( @ adrianchen ) `` i 've lived in nyc for 26 years and there has never been a food problem because of a storm ! ''
-dude at coffee shop begging to get eaten first ( h/t : @ twitterid )
the weather channel has named this blizzard juno .
people hate that the weather channel , a wholly owned subsidiary of nbcuniversal , presumes to do this , christen whole storm systems .
this time , at least one connecticut news station is not playing ball .

wfsbnews is calling the storm colbie : jake catanese ( @ jcatanese43 ) i thought naming these storms would cut down on confusion but @ twitterid ( ct ) has # blizzardcolbie and @ twitterid has # blizzardjuno wnyc has made a callout for submissions for # betterblizzardnames - though we think they 're doing pretty well on their own : wnyc ( @ wnyc ) blza # betterblizzardnames wnyc ( @ wnyc ) blza # betterblizzardnames ( thanks to @ twitterid and @ twitterid )
on our radar : the new york governor 's upcoming news conference with officials in charge of emergency response .
andrew cuomo ( @ nygovcuomo ) at 12 noon , we 're holding a storm briefing with @ twitterid chairman tom prendergast & @ twitterid ed pat foye .
watch live : new york city mayor bill de blasio has moved his news conference to 12.45 pm et .

no word yet on any appearance by new jersey governor chris christie or by other regional governors - pennsylvania 's tom wolf , rhode island 's gina raimondo , massachusetts ' charlie baker , or maine 's paul lepage .

documents.title: storm preparation tips
text: most deaths from winter storms occur from traffic accidents , fires from improper use of heaters , overexertion , and exposure , according to the new york city office of emergency management .
the office lists these tips for what to do before a storm strikes '' : listen to noaa weather radio and your local radio and tv stations for updated storm information .
know what winter storm watches and warnings mean .
check on relatives , friends , and neighbors who may need assistance preparing for a storm .
be alert to changing weather conditions and avoid unnecessary travel .
let faucets drip a little to help prevent freezing .
test smoke and carbon monoxide detectors .
zakim bunker hill bridge into downtown boston. , monday , jan. 26 , 2015 .
krupa/ap
boston 's main airport will not even try to fly this evening , the local fox station reports .
flightaware has 2,676 flight cancellations so far today , and 3,230 total delays .
if schadenfreude is your thing you can enjoy their misery map here .
fox 25 news boston ( @ fox25news ) just in : logan anticipates no flights out of airport after 7 pm .
airlines may not be flying in or out at all tuesday .
# fox25blizzard # bosnow ( h/t : @ twitterid )

documents.title: connecticut announces 9pm travel ban
text: connecticut governor dan malloy has just given an update on preparations for the storm .
public transit will cease at 8pm et and a ban on cars will follow an hour later , he said .
update : as part of this announcement , malloy declared a state of emergency for connecticut .
malloy said the state would weather the storm .
we 've had a run of this , we know what we need to do , we know how long it will take to recover , '' he said .
emergency crews including tree-removal and power-restoration crews would come from as far away as ontario , canada , to help with storm recovery efforts , he said .
the governor was asked whether a professional wrestling event scheduled for the xl center in hartford would be cancelled .
as important to the world economy as wrestling is , public safety tops it , '' malloy said .
but apparently no , it 's not cancelled .
good morning and welcome to our live blog coverage of a major snowstorm descending on the north-east .
multiple weather models show possible record-breaking levels of snow - more than 26.9 inches in new york city - falling between monday morning and the end of the day tuesday .
the region is moving into a defensive crouch .
some schools are closed , thousands of flights have been cancelled , and city , county and state officials are mobilizing a big-as-it-gets emergency response .
the national weather service has issued a blizzard warning extending from atlantic city , new jersey , to far eastern maine , warning of a crippling and potentially historic '' storm .
this could be a storm the likes of which we have never seen before , '' new york city mayor bill de blasio said at a news conference on sunday .
he 's to hold another news conference shortly on how the city is preparing for the wallop .

nws ( @ nws ) today 's weather : major # noreaster expected to bring hvy snow , blizzard conditions to northeast we 'll update this blog continuously throughout the day with snowfall totals , emergency information , transportation updates , photos of the storm and more .
